event.title: donated a 320-acre (130 ha) site on the Pedernales River for the founding of the town in 1879

data.event: James Polk Johnson donated a 320-acre (130 ha) site on the Pedernales River for the founding of the town in 1879.

event.title: was moved to Johnson City in 1890

data.event: The county seat of Blanco County was moved to Johnson City in 1890.
